metadata.description: Plugins from the Collaborator project — bring persistent AI judgment into your coding tools.

plugins.name: initiative
plugins.description: Run the Initiative pipeline against a notes collection. Surveys your vault, infers goals, identifies blockers, derives actions, and proposes what the Collaborator should do next.

plugins.name: collab
plugins.description: Invoke the Collaborator persona in any AI coding tool. Loads identity, context, memory, and judgment — turning your AI into a creative partner with opinions.
